mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, username, inputtime, tel, email, state, admin, dep_id, password) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{inputtime}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{state}, #{admin}, #{department.id}, #{password})
mapper.update: update employee set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inputtime = #{inputtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, admin = #{admin,jdbcType=BIT}, dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT e.`id` ,username,inputtime,tel,email,state,admin,d.`id` AS dep_id,d.`name` AS dep_name FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON d.`id`=e.`dep_id`
